english.segment1: It's the same thing, the same dream every time. You're running in a straight line. Speeding through the light
english.segment2: And you're stronger than you've ever been. In a place you've never seen. And everything is right
english.segment3: And something's calling. Something's haunting you. And you want it - and you want it
english.segment4: Chorus: It's all about to change. Nothing stays the same. It's getting closer every single day
english.segment5: It's all about to change. It'll never be the same. Any day now you will start again
english.segment6: And you wake, a stranger to your bed. But science tells your head. That nothing looks the same in the light
english.segment7: And your day's spent looking for the dream. Is it going to come again?. Could anything be so bright?
english.segment8: Hear it calling. All day long. And you want it - and you want it
